name: Goodbye, Emile
description:
A very short experience made primarily to learn a bit of coding. There is at least one interaction per room, one of them is locked if Emile is too hungry.

Discover a bit of the lore of the Solidsphere Universe in Emile's Choose Your Own Adventure Gamebook.

Only on windows for now. Let me know if you find any bugs in the comments.

Made on Unity using Bolt.
